short_text: 'Al-Jinn' is the name of this Surah as well as the title of its subject matter, for in it the event of the Jinn's hearing the Qur'an and returning to their people to preach Islam to them, has been related in detail.
text:
"Al-Jinn " is the name of this Surah as well as the title of its subject matter, for in it the event of the Jinn's hearing the Qur'an and returning to their people to preach Islam to them, has been related in detail.

Period of Revelation

According to a tradition related in Bukhari and Muslim, on the authority of Hadrat Abdullah bin Abbas, once the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) was going to Visit the Fair of Ukaz with some of his Companions, On the way be led the Fajr Prayer at Nakhlah. At that time a company of the jinn happened to pass that way. When they heard the Quran being recited, they tarried and listened to it attentively. This very event has been described in this Surah.

Most of the commentators, on the basis of this tradition, believe that this relates to the Holy Prophet's well known journey to Taif, which had taken place three years before the Hijrah in the 10th year of the Prophethood. But this is not correct for several reasons. The jinn's hearing the Qur'an during the journey to Taif has been related in Al-Ahqaf 29-32. A cursory reading of those verses shows that the jinn who had believed after hearing the Qur'an on that occasion were already believers in the Prophet Moses and the previous scriptures. On the contrary, vv. 2-7 of this surah clearly show that the jinn who heard the Qur'an on this occasion were polytheists and deniers of the Hereafter and Prophethood. Then, it is confirmed historically that in his journey to Taif none accompanied the Holy Prophet except Hadrat Zaid bin Harithah. On the contrary, concerning this journey Ibn Abbas says that the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) was accompanied by some of his Companions.
Furthermore, the traditions also agree that in that journey the jinn heard the Qur'an when the Holy Prophet had stopped at Nakhlah on his return journey from Taif to Makkah, and in this journey, according to the traditions of Ibn Abbas, the event of the jinn's hearing the Qur'an occurred when the Holy Prophet was going to Ukaz from Makkah. Therefore, in view of these reasons what seems to be correct is that in Surah Al-Ahqaf and Surah Al Jinn, one and the same event has not been narrated, but these were two separate events, which took place during two separate journeys.

As far as Surah Al-Ahqaf is concerned, it is agreed that the event mentioned in it occurred on the return journey from Taif in the 10th year of Prophethood. As for the question, when this second event took place, its answer is not given by the tradition of Ibn Abbas, nor any other historical tradition shows as to when the Holy Prophet had gone to the Fair of Ukaz along with some of his Companions. However, a little consideration of vv. 8-10 of this surah shows that this could only be an event of the earliest stage of Prophethood. In these verses it has been stated that before the appointment of the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) to Divine Mission the jinn used to have one or another opportunity to eavesdrop in the heavens in order to hear news of the unseen, but after it they suddenly found that angels had been set as guards and meteorites were being shot on every side so that they could find no place of safety from where they could hear the secret news. Thereupon they had set
about searching for the unusual thing that had occurred on the earth, or was going to occur, because of which the security measures had been tightened up. Probably since then many companies of the jinn must have been moving about in search of the unusual occurrence and one of them after having heard the Qur'an from the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) must have formed the opinion that that was the very thing for the sake of which all the gates of the heavens had been shut against the jinn.

Reality of Jinn

Before one starts the study of this Surah one must clearly know what is the reality of the jinn so as to avoid any possible mental confusion. Many people of the modern times are involved in the misunderstanding that the jinn are not real, but only a figment of the ancient superstition and myths. They have not formed this opinion on the basis that they have known all the realities and truths about the universe and have thus discovered that the jinn do not exist. They cannot claim to possess any such knowledge either. But they have assumed without reason and proof that nothing exists in the universe except what they can see, whereas the sphere of human perceptions as against the vastness of this great universe is not even comparable to a drop of water as against the ocean. Here, the person who thinks that what he does not perceive, does not exist, and what exists must necessarily be perceived, in fact, provides a proof of the narrowness of his own mind. With this mode of thought,
not to speak of the jinn, man cannot even accept and acknowledge any reality, which he cannot directly experience and observe, and he cannot even admit the existence of God, to say nothing of admitting any other unseen reality.

Those of the Muslims who have been influenced by modernism, but cannot deny the Qur'an either, have given strange interpretations of the clear statements of the Qur'an about the jinn, Iblis and Satan. They say that this does not refer to any hidden creation, which may have its own independent existence, but it sometimes implies man's own animal forces, which have been called Satan, and sometimes it implies savage and wild mountain tribes, and sometimes the people who used to listen to the Qur'an secretly. But the statements of the Qur'an in this regard are so clear and explicit that these interpretations bear no relevance to them whatever.

The Qur'an frequently mentions the jinn and the men in a manner as to indicate that they are two separate creations. For this, see Al Araf: 38, Hud: 119, Ha Mim As-Sajdah: 25,29, Ahqaf: 18, Adh Dhariyat: 56, and the entire surah Ar-Rahman, which bears such clear evidence as to leave no room to regard the jinn as a human species.

In Surah Al-Araf: 12, Al Hijr: 26-27 and Ar-Rahman: 14-19, it has been expressly stated that man was created out of clay and jinn out of fire.

In Surah Al Hijr: 27, it has been said that the jinn had been created before man. The same thing is testified by the story of Adam and Iblis, which has been told at seven different places in the Qur'an, and at every place it confirms that Iblis was already there at the creation of man. Moreover, in surah Al- Kahf: 50, it has been stated that Iblis belonged to the jinn.

In Surah Al-Araf: 27,, it has been stated in clear words that the jinn see the human beings but the human beings do not see them.

In Surah Al Hijr: 16-18, Surah As-Saaffat: 6-10 and Surah Al-Mulk: 5, it has been said that although the jinn can ascend to the heavens, they cannot exceed a certain limit; if they try to ascend beyond that limit and try to hear what goes on in the heavens, they are not allowed to do so, and if they try to eavesdrop they are driven away by meteorites. By this the belief of the polytheistic Arabs that the jinn possess the knowledge of the unseen, or have access to Divine secrets, has been refuted. The same error has a]so been refuted in Saba: 14.

Al-Baqarah: 30-34 and Al- Kahf: 50 show that Allah has entrusted man with the vicegerency of the earth and the men are superior to the jinn. Although the jinn also have been given certain extraordinary powers and abilities an example of which is found in An-Naml: 39, yet the animals likewise have been given some powers greater than man, but these are no argument that the animals are superior to man.

The Qur'an also explains that the jinn, like men, are a creation possessed of power and authority, and they, just like them, can choose between obedience and disobedience, faith and disbelief. This is confirmed by the story of Satan and the event of the jinn affirming the faith as found in Surahs Al-Ahqaf and Al-Jinn.

At scores of places in the Qur'an, it has also been stated that Iblis at the very creation of Adam had resolved to misguide mankind, and since then the Satanic jinn have been persistently trying to mislead man, but they do not have the power to overwhelm him and make him do something forcibly. However, they inspire him with evil suggestions, beguile him and make evil seem good to him. For this, see An-Nisa: 117-120, Al-Araf: 11-17, Ibrahim: 22, Al-Hijr: 30-42, An-Nahl: 98-100, Bani Israil 61-65.

The Qur'an also tells us that in the pre Islamic ignorance the polytheistic Arabs regarded the jinn as associates of God, worshiped them and thought they were descended from God. For this, see Al-An'am: 100, Saba: 40-41, As Saffat: 158.

From these details, it becomes abundantly clear that the jinn have their own objective existence and are a concealed creation of an entirely different species from man. Because of their mysterious qualities, ignorant people have formed exaggerated notions and concepts about them and their powers, and have even worshiped them, but the Qur'an has explained the whole truth about them, which shows what they are and what they are not.

Theme and Topics

In this Surah in vv. 1-15, it has been told what was the impact of the Qur'an on the company of the jinn when they heard it and what they said to their fellow jinn when they returned to them. Allah, in this connection, has not cited their whole conversation but only those particular things which were worthy of mention. That is why the style is not that of a continuous speech but sentences have been cited so as to indicate that they said this and this. If one studies these sentences spoken by the jinn carefully, one can easily understand the real object of the narration of this event of their affirming the faith and or mentioning this conversation of theirs with their people in the Qur'an. The explanations that we have given of their statements in our Notes will be of further help in understanding this object.

After this, in vv. 16-18, the people have been admonished to the effect:"If you refrain from polytheism and follow the way of righteousness firmly, you will be blessed; otherwise if you turn away from the admonition sent down by Allah, you will meet with a severe punishment." Then, in vv. 19-23, the disbelievers of Makkah have been reproached, as if to say: When the Messenger of Allah calls you towards Allah, you surround and mob him from every side, whereas the only duty of the Messenger is to convey the messages of Allah. He does not claim to have any power to bring any gain or cause any harm to the people." Then, in vv. 24-25 the disbelievers have been warned to the effect: "Today you are trying to overpower and suppress the Messenger seeing that he is helpless and friendless, but a time will come when you will know who in actual fact is helpless and friendless. Whether that time is yet far off, or near at hand, the Messenger has no knowledge thereof, but it will come to pass
in any case." In conclusion, the people have been told: The Knower of the unseen is Allah alone. The Messenger receives only that knowledge which Allah is pleased to give him. This knowledge pertains to matters connected with the performance of the duties of Prophethood and it is delivered to him in such security which does not admit of any external interference whatever.
description: The surah that opens with the revelation that a group of The Jinn listened to the Prophet reciting the Quran, believed in it, and so admonished their own race. It is names after the jinn-kind, whose account is given in its first part. The surah begins with the account of what a group of jinn said when they overheard a recitation of the Quran and realized its truth (verse 1 .). This is a lesson to the Meccan Arabs, who are also told that the Prophet can help them only by delivering the Message—God is the All Powerful One (verse 16 .). The disbelievers are threatened with what they will meet on the Day of Judgement (verse 23 ).The surah is also known as: Jinn-kind, Sprites, The Jinn's, The Spirits.

Albanian.verse 72:1: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Mua m’u ka shpallur se disa prej xhindëve (krijesa të padukshme), kanë dëgjuar dhe kanë thënë: “Me të vërtetë, kemi dëgjuar (një) Kur’an të mrekullueshëm,
Albanian.verse 72:2: i cili udhëzon në rrugën e drejtë – e ne kemi besuar në të, dhe kurrsesi më nuk do t’i bëjmë shok askë Perëndisë sonë,
Albanian.verse 72:3: e, me të vërtetë, qoftë, lartë madhëria e Tij – Zotit tonë! Ai, nuk ka marrë për Vete as bashkëshorte as fëmijë;
Albanian.verse 72:4: (Disa) të marrët nga ne, flisnin gënjeshtra për Perëndinë,
Albanian.verse 72:5: kurse ne, kemi menduar se as njerëzit as xhindët nuk flasin gënjeshtra për Perëndinë;
Albanian.verse 72:6: e disa njerëz kanë kërkuar strehim te disa xhindë, e kjo vetëm që ua shtoi atyre tërbimin,
Albanian.verse 72:7: dhe, ata mendojnë siç mendoni edhe ju: se, Perëndia nuk do të ringjallë askë;
Albanian.verse 72:8: ne jemi ata që kemi arritur në qiell, por kemi hasur në plotë roje të forta (engjëj) dhe shigjeta të zjarrta (meteorë);
Albanian.verse 72:9: dhe uleshim rreth tij, nëpër vende të përshtatshme për të dëgjuar diçka, por ai që përgjon tani, do të hasë në shigjeta të zjarrta (meteorë) që janë në pritje (pusi),
Albanian.verse 72:10: dhe ne nuk dimë, se e keqja i qëllimohet atyre që janë në Tokë, apo Zoti i tyre don t’i udhëzojë në rrugë të mirë,
Albanian.verse 72:11: e midis nesh ka të mirë dhe ka që nuk janë të mirë, ka prej nesh kategori të ndryshme, (grupe të përçara);
Albanian.verse 72:12: dhe ne e kemi ditur se nuk do të mund t’i shpëtojmë Perëndisë në Tokë dhe nuk mund ta lodhim Atë duke ikur (në qiell);
Albanian.verse 72:13: dhe ne, posa dëgjuam udhëzimin (Kur’anin), besuam në të; e kush beson në Zotin e vet, nuk ka përse të druajë nga dëmi as nga zullumi (tërbimi);
Albanian.verse 72:14: dhe ka prej nesh muslimanë, e ka prej nesh edhe mëkatarë, e kush e ka përqafuar islamizmin, e ka zgjedhur rrugën e drejtë,
Albanian.verse 72:15: kurse, jobesimtarët, do të jenë lëndë djegëse të skëterrës”.
Albanian.verse 72:16: Sikur të qëndronin në rrugën e vërtetë, Ne do t’i furnizonim me ujë të bollshëm,
Albanian.verse 72:17: për t’i vënë me këtë në sprovë ata; e kushdo që largohet nga të përkujtuarit Zotin e tij, Zoti atë ia nënshtron dënimit të ashpër.
Albanian.verse 72:18: Xhamiat i janë kushtuar Perëndisë, dhe mos iu lutni askujt, përveç Perëndisë!
Albanian.verse 72:19: E, kur adhuruesi i Perëndisë (Muhammedi), u ngrit t’i lutet Atij, ata (xhindët) u tubuan rreth tij si të ishin shtëllungë leshi.
Albanian.verse 72:20: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Unë i lutem vetëm Zotit tim dhe askë s’ia bëjë shok Atij”.
Albanian.verse 72:21: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Unë nuk mundem t’jua largojë ndonjë dëm juve e as t’ua sjell ndonjë dobi (vetëm Perëndia ka pushtet për këtë)”.
Albanian.verse 72:22: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Me të vërtetë, mua askush nuk mund të më mbrojë nga dënimi i Perëndisë; as që mund të gjejë strehim tjetër kund, përveç te Ai, -
Albanian.verse 72:23: (Unë s’kam tjetër funksion) përveç që t’ua predikojë atë që vjen nga Perëndia dhe të dërguarit e Tij”. E, ai që s’dëgjon Perëndinë dhe të Dërguarin e Tij, atë e pret zjarri i skëterrës, në të cilin do të mbetet përgjithmonë. –
Albanian.verse 72:24: E, kur ata të shohin atë për çka u është tërhequr vërejtja, do ta dinë ata se kush është më i dobët (në ndihmë) dhe në numër më i vogël.
Albanian.verse 72:25: Thuaj (o Muhammed!): “Unë nuk e di, a është afër ajo që u është premtuar juve, apo Zoti im ka caktuar për të afat (më të gjatë),
Albanian.verse 72:26: vetëm Ai i di sekretet dhe Ai nuk ia zbulon sekretet e Veta askujt;
Albanian.verse 72:27: përveç atij të cilin Ai e ka zgjedhur për të dërguar (pejgamber); andaj, Ai para tij dhe pas tij, i vë ata që e ruajnë (engjëjt)
Albanian.verse 72:28: në mënyrë që t’i dijë (qartë) se a i kanë zbatuar misionet e Zotit të tyre. Ai di në hollësi çdo gjë që është te të dërguarit; Ai di numrin e çdo gjëje që ekziston.

Amharic.verse 72:1: (ሙሐመድ ሆይ!) በል «እነሆ ከጂን የኾኑ ጭፈሮች (ቁርኣንን) አዳመጡ፡፡‹እኛ አስደናቂ የኾነን ቁርኣን ሰማንም› አሉ ማለት ወደእኔ ተወረደ፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:2: ‹ወደ ቀጥታ መንገድ የሚመራን (ቁርአን ሰማን)፡፡ በእርሱም አመንን፡፡ በጌታችንም አንድንም አናጋራም፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:3: ‹እነሆም የጌታችን ክብር ላቀ፡፡ ሚስትንም ልጅንም አልያዘም፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:4: ‹እነሆም ቂላችን በአላህ ላይ ወሰን ያለፈን (ውሸት) ይናገር ነበር፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:5: ‹እኛም ሰዎችና ጋኔኖች በአላህ ላይ ውሸትን (ቃል) አይናገሩም ማለትን ጠረጠርን፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:6: ‹እነሆም ከሰዎች የኾኑ ወንዶች በጋኔን ወንዶች ይጠበቁ ነበሩ፡፡ ኩራትንም ጨመሩዋቸው፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:7: ‹እነርሱም አላህ አንድንም አይቀሰቅስም ማለትን እንደጠረጠራችሁ ጠረጠሩ፡፡›
Amharic.verse 72:8: ‹እኛም ሰማይን (ለመድረስ) ፈለግን፡፡ ብርቱ ጠባቂዎችንና ችቦዎችንም ተሞልታ አገኘናት፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:9: ‹እኛም ከእርሷ (ወሬን) ለማደመጥ በመቀመጫዎች እንቀመጥ ነበርን፡፡ አሁን ግን የሚያዳምጥ ሰው ለእርሱ ተጠባባቂ ችቦን ያገኛል፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:10: ‹እኛም በምድር ውስጥ ባልሉ ሰዎች ክፉ ተሽቷል? ወይስ በእነርሱ ጌታቸው ደግን ነገር ሽቷል? ማለትን አናውቅም፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:11: ‹እኛም ከእኛ ውስጥ ደጎች አልሉ፡፡ ከኛም ከዚህ ሌላ የኾኑ አልሉ፡፡ የተለያዩ መንገዶች (ባለ ቤቶች) ነበርን፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:12: ‹እኛም አላህን በምድር ውስጥ ፈጽሞ የማናቅተው፤ ሸሽተንም ፈጽሞ የማናመልጠው መኾናችንን አረጋገጥን፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:13: ‹እኛም መሪውን በሰማን ጊዜ በርሱ አመንን፡፡ በጌታውም የሚያምን ሰው መግጎደልንም መጭጨመርንም አይፈራም፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:14: «እኛም ከእኛ ውስጥ ሙስሊሞች አልሉ፡፡ ከእኛም ውስጥ በዳዮች አልሉ፡፡ የሰለሙም ሰዎች እነዚያ ቅንን መንገድ መረጡ፡፡»
Amharic.verse 72:16: እነሆም በመንገዲቱ ላይ ቀጥ ባሉ ኖሮ ብዙ ዝናምን ባጠጣናቸው ነበር (ማለትም ተወረደልኝ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:17: በእርሱ ልንሞክራቸው (ባጠጣናቸው ነበር)፡፡ ከጌታውም ማስታወሻ የሚያፈገፍግ ሰው አስቸጋሪን ቅጣት ያገባዋል፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:18: እነሆ መስጊዶችም የአላህ ብቻ ናቸው፡፡ (በውስጣቸው) ከአላህ ጋር አንድንም አትገዙ (ማለትም)፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:19: እነሆም የአላህ ባሪያ (ሙሐመድ አላህን) የሚጠራው ኾኖ በተነሳ ጊዜ (ጋኔኖች) በእርሱ ላይ ድርብርቦች ሊኾኑ ቀረቡ (ማለትም)፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:20: «እኔ የምግገዛው ጌታየን ብቻ ነው፡፡ በእርሱም አንድንም አላጋራም» በል፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:22: «እኔ ከአላህ (ቅጣት) አንድም አያድነኝም፡፡ ከእርሱም ሌላ መጠጊያን አላገኝም» በላቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:23: «ከአላህ የኾነ ማድረስን መልክቶቹንም በስተቀር (አልችልም)፡፡ አላህንና መልክተኛውንም የሚያምጽ ሰው ለእርሱ የገሀነም እሳት አልለው፡፡ በውስጧ ዘላለም ዘውታሪዎች ሲኾኑ፡፡»
Amharic.verse 72:24: የሚስፈራሩበትንም ባዩ ጊዜ ረዳቱ ደካማ፣ ቁጥሩም አነስተኛ የኾነው ማን እንደኾነ በእርግጥ ያውቃሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:25: «የምትስፈራሩበት ነገር ቅርብ ወይም ጌታየ ለእርሱ የተወሰነ ጊዜን የሚያደርግለት (ሩቅ) መኾኑን አላውቅም» በላቸው፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:26: «(እርሱ) ሩቁን ምስጢር ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡ በምስጢሩም ላይ አንድንም አያሳውቅም፡፡»
Amharic.verse 72:27: ከመልክተኛ ለወደደው ቢኾን እንጅ (ለሌላ አይገልጽም)፡፡ እርሱም ከስተፊቱም ከስተኋላውም ጠባቂዎችን ያደርግለታል፡፡
Amharic.verse 72:28: እነርሱ ዘንድ ባለው ነገር ዕውቀቱ የከበበና ነገሩንም ሁሉ በቁጥር ያጠቃለለ ሲኾን የጌታቸውን መልክቶች ያደረሱ መኾናቸውን ያውቅ ዘንድ (ጠባቂ ያደርጋል)፡፡

Arabic.verse 72:2: اًدَحَأ اَنِّبَرِب َكِرْشُّن نَلَو ۖ ِهِب اَّنَمآَف ِدْشُّرلا ىَلِإ يِدْهَي
Arabic.verse 72:5: اًبِذَك ِهَّللا ىَلَع ُّنِجْلاَو ُسنِإْلا َلوُقَت نَّل نَأ اَّنَنَظ اَّنَأَو
Arabic.verse 72:8: اًبُهُشَو اًديِدَش اًسَرَح ْتَئِلُم اَهاَنْدَجَوَف َءاَمَّسلا اَنْسَمَل اَّنَأَو
Arabic.verse 72:9: اًدَصَّر اًباَهِش ُهَل ْدِجَي َنآْلا ِعِمَتْسَي نَمَف ۖ ِعْمَّسلِل َدِعاَقَم اَهْنِم ُدُعْقَن اَّنُك اَّنَأَو
Arabic.verse 72:12: (اًبَرَه ُهَزِجْعُّن نَلَو ِضْرَأْلا يِف َهَّللا َزِجْعُّن نَّل نَأ اَّنَنَظ اَّنَأَو
Arabic.verse 72:13: (اًقَهَر اَلَو اًسْخَب ُفاَخَي اَلَف ِهِّبَرِب نِمْؤُي نَمَف ۖ ِهِب اَّنَمآ ٰىَدُهْلا اَنْعِمَس اَّمَل اَّنَأَو

Azerbaijani.verse 72:1: De: “Mənə vəhy olundu ki, cinlərdən bir dəstə Quranı dinlədikdən sonra öz tayfalarına qayıdıb dedilər: “Həqiqətən, biz heyrətamiz bir Quran dinlədik!
Azerbaijani.verse 72:2: O, doğru yola yönəldir. Biz ona inandıq və bundan sonra əsla kimsəni Rəbbimizə şərik qoşmayacağıq.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:3: Doğrudan da, Rəbbimizin əzəməti çox yüksəkdir. O, nə zövcə, nə də övlad sahibi olmamışdır.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:4: Bizim səfehimiz İblis Allaha qarşı hədsiz yalanlar danışır.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:5: Biz zənnə qapılaraq düşünürdük ki, insanlar da, cinlər də Allaha iftira atmazlar.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:6: Həqiqətən, insanlardan bəziləri cinlərin bəzilərinə sığınırdılar. Bu isə onların azğınlığını artırırdı.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:7: Onlar da siz zənn etdiyiniz kimi, elə düşünürdülər ki, Allah ölənləri diriltməyəcəkdir.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:8: Biz səmaya qalxdıqda onun sərt gözətçilər və yandırıb-yaxan alovlarla dolu olduğunun şahidi olduq.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:9: Biz əvvəllər gizlicə qulaq asmaq üçün göyün bəzi sahələrində oturardıq. Amma kim bunu indi etmək istəsə, o, pusquda gözləyən yandırıcı alova rast gələr.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:10: Biz bilmirik, bununla yerdəkilərə pislik etmək qəsd edilmişdir, yoxsa Rəbbi onları doğru yola yönəltmək istəmişdir?
Azerbaijani.verse 72:11: Əlbəttə, aramızda xeyirxah əməl sahibləri də, onlar kimi olmayanlar da var. Biz ayrı-ayrı yollar tutmuşuq.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:12: Biz yəqin etdik ki, yer üzündə Allahdan yaxa qurtara bilmərik. Göyə qaçmalı olsaq da Onun əzabından yayına bilməyəcəyik.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:13: Biz doğru yolu göstərən rəhbəri eşitdiyimiz zaman ona iman gətirdik. Rəbbinə iman gətirən, nə savabının azalmasından, nə də haqsızlığa uğramaqdan qorxmaz.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:14: Sözsüz ki, bizlərdən müsəlmanlar da var, doğru yoldan sapanlar da. Müsəlman olan şəxslər doğru yol tutanlardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:15: Doğru yoldan sapanlar Cəhənnəm üçün odun olacaqlar”.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:16: Əgər onlar o yolda sabit qalsaydılar, Biz onlara bol-bol su verərdik.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:17: Belə edərdik ki, bununla onları sınayaq. Kim öz Rəbbinin zikrindən üz döndərərsə, O, həmin şəxsi şiddətli bir əzaba məruz qoyar.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:18: Şübhəsiz ki, məscidlər Allahındır. Allahdan başqa heç kəsə dua etməyin!
Azerbaijani.verse 72:19: Allahın qulu qalxıb Allaha dua etdikdə cinlər az qala onun dövrəsində bir-birinə keçib çəpər yaradırdılar.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:20: De: “Mən yalnız öz Rəbbimə dua edirəm və kimisə Ona şərik qoşmuram!”
Azerbaijani.verse 72:21: De: “Mən sizə nə ziyan verməyə, nə də sizi doğru yola yönəltməyə qadir deyiləm!”
Azerbaijani.verse 72:22: De: “Həqiqətən, məni Allahdan kimsə xilas edə bilməz və mən Ondan başqa bir pənah yeri tapa bilmərəm!
Azerbaijani.verse 72:23: Mənim əlimdən gələn ancaq Allahı və Onun göndərdiklərini təbliğ etməkdir. Kim Allaha və Onun Elçisinə asi olarsa, onun üçün içərisində əbədi qalacaqları Cəhənnəm odu hazırlanmışdır”.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:24: Onlar özlərinə vəd olunmuş əzabı gördükləri zaman kimin köməkçisinin daha zəif və sayca daha az olduğunu biləcəklər.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:25: De: “Mən sizə vəd olunmuş əzabın yaxın olduğunu və yaxud Rəbbimin onun üçün uzun bir müddət təyin etmiş olduğunu bilmirəm.
Azerbaijani.verse 72:26: O, qeybi Biləndir və Öz qeybini heç kəsə açmaz;
Azerbaijani.verse 72:27: razı qaldığı elçidən başqa. Həqiqətən, Allah onların önündə və arxasında gözətçilər qoyur ki,
Azerbaijani.verse 72:28: hər kəs onların, Rəbbinin göndərdiklərini necə təbliğ etdiyini bilsin. Allah onların nə etdiklərini nəzarəti altında saxlayır və hər şeyi ayrı-ayrılıqda hesaba alır”.

Bengali.verse 72:1: বলুনঃ আমার প্রতি ওহী নাযিল করা হয়েছে যে, জিনদের একটি দল কোরআন শ্রবণ করেছে, অতঃপর তারা বলেছেঃ আমরা বিস্ময়কর কোরআন শ্রবণ করেছি;
Bengali.verse 72:2: যা সৎপথ প্রদর্শন করে। ফলে আমরা তাতে বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করেছি। আমরা কখনও আমাদের পালনকর্তার সাথে কাউকে শরীক করব না।
Bengali.verse 72:3: এবং আরও বিশ্বাস করি যে, আমাদের পালনকর্তার মহান মর্যাদা সবার উর্ধ্বে। তিনি কোন পত্নী গ্রহণ করেননি এবং তাঁর কোন সন্তান নেই।
Bengali.verse 72:4: আমাদের মধ্যে নির্বোধেরা আল্লাহ তা’আলা সম্পর্কে বাড়াবাড়ির কথাবার্তা বলত।
Bengali.verse 72:5: অথচ আমরা মনে করতাম, মানুষ ও জিন কখনও আল্লাহ তা’আলা সম্পর্কে মিথ্যা বলতে পারে না।
Bengali.verse 72:6: অনেক মানুষ অনেক জিনের আশ্রয় নিত, ফলে তারা জিনদের আত্নম্ভরিতা বাড়িয়ে দিত।
Bengali.verse 72:7: তারা ধারণা করত, যেমন তোমরা মানবেরা ধারণা কর যে, মৃত্যুর পর আল্লাহ তা’আলা কখনও কাউকে পুনরুত্থিত করবেন না।
Bengali.verse 72:8: আমরা আকাশ পর্যবেক্ষণ করছি, অতঃপর দেখতে পেয়েছি যে, কঠোর প্রহরী ও উল্কাপিন্ড দ্বারা আকাশ পরিপূর্ণ।
Bengali.verse 72:9: আমরা আকাশের বিভিন্ন ঘাঁটিতে সংবাদ শ্রবণার্থে বসতাম। এখন কেউ সংবাদ শুনতে চাইলে সে জলন্ত উল্কাপিন্ড ওঁৎ পেতে থাকতে দেখে।
Bengali.verse 72:10: আমরা জানি না পৃথিবীবাসীদের অমঙ্গল সাধন করা অভীষ্ট, না তাদের পালনকর্তা তাদের মঙ্গল সাধন করার ইচ্ছা রাখেন।
Bengali.verse 72:11: আমাদের কেউ কেউ সৎকর্মপরায়ণ এবং কেউ কেউ এরূপ নয়। আমরা ছিলাম বিভিন্ন পথে বিভক্ত।
Bengali.verse 72:12: আমরা বুঝতে পেরেছি যে, আমরা পৃথিবীতে আল্লাহ তা’আলাকে পরাস্ত করতে পারব না এবং পলায়ন করেও তাকে অপারক করত পরব না।
Bengali.verse 72:13: আমরা যখন সুপথের নির্দেশ শুনলাম, তখন তাতে বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করলাম। অতএব, যে তার পালনকর্তার প্রতি বিশ্বাস করে, সে লোকসান ও জোর-জবরের আশংকা করে না।
Bengali.verse 72:14: আমাদের কিছুসংখ্যক আজ্ঞাবহ এবং কিছুসংখ্যক অন্যায়কারী। যারা আজ্ঞাবহ হয়, তারা সৎপথ বেছে নিয়েছে।
Bengali.verse 72:15: আর যারা অন্যায়কারী, তারা তো জাহান্নামের ইন্ধন।
Bengali.verse 72:16: আর এই প্রত্যাদেশ করা হয়েছে যে, তারা যদি সত্যপথে কায়েম থাকত, তবে আমি তাদেরকে প্রচুর পানি বর্ষণে সিক্ত করতাম।
Bengali.verse 72:17: যাতে এ ব্যাপারে তাদেরকে পরীক্ষা করি। পক্ষান্তরে যে ব্যক্তি তার পালনকর্তার স্মরণ থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয়, তিনি তাকে উদীয়মান আযাবে পরিচালিত করবেন।
Bengali.verse 72:18: এবং এই ওহীও করা হয়েছে যে, মসজিদসমূহ আল্লাহ তা’আলাকে স্মরণ করার জন্য। অতএব, তোমরা আল্লাহ তা’আলার সাথে কাউকে ডেকো না।
Bengali.verse 72:19: আর যখন আল্লাহ তা’আলার বান্দা তাঁকে ডাকার জন্যে দন্ডায়মান হল, তখন অনেক জিন তার কাছে ভিড় জমাল।
Bengali.verse 72:20: বলুনঃ আমি তো আমার পালনকর্তাকেই ডাকি এবং তাঁর সাথে কাউকে শরীক করি না।
Bengali.verse 72:21: বলুনঃ আমি তোমাদের ক্ষতি সাধন করার ও সুপথে আনয়ন করার মালিক নই।
Bengali.verse 72:22: বলুনঃ আল্লাহ তা’আলার কবল থেকে আমাকে কেউ রক্ষা করতে পারবে না এবং তিনি ব্যতীত আমি কোন আশ্রয়স্থল পাব না।
Bengali.verse 72:23: কিন্তু আল্লাহ তা’আলার বাণী পৌছানো ও তাঁর পয়গাম প্রচার করাই আমার কাজ। যে আল্লাহ ও তাঁর রসূলকে অমান্য করে, তার জন্যে রয়েছে জাহান্নামের অগ্নি। তথায় তারা চিরকাল থাকবে।
Bengali.verse 72:24: এমনকি যখন তারা প্রতিশ্রুত শাস্তি দেখতে পাবে, তখন তারা জানতে পারবে, কার সাহায্যকারী দূর্বল এবং কার সংখ্যা কম।
Bengali.verse 72:25: বলুনঃ আমি জানি না তোমাদের প্রতিশ্রুত বিষয় আসন্ন না আমার পালনকর্তা এর জন্যে কোন মেয়াদ স্থির করে রেখেছেন।
Bengali.verse 72:26: তিনি অদৃশ্যের জ্ঞানী। পরন্ত তিনি অদৃশ্য বিষয় কারও কাছে প্রকাশ করেন না।
Bengali.verse 72:27: তাঁর মনোনীত রসূল ব্যতীত। তখন তিনি তার অগ্রে ও পশ্চাতে প্রহরী নিযুক্ত করেন
Bengali.verse 72:28: যাতে আল্লাহ তা’আলা জেনে নেন যে, রসূলগণ তাঁদের পালনকর্তার পয়গাম পৌছিয়েছেন কি না। রসূলগণের কাছে যা আছে, তা তাঁর জ্ঞান-গোচর। তিনি সবকিছুর সংখ্যার হিসাব রাখেন।

Berber Amazigh.verse 72:1: Ini: "ippuweêêa yi d, ar agraw n leonun ssemêessen, u nnan: ih, nesla i Leqwôan, d lwehma.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:2: Inehhu ar ûûwab, d$a numen yis. I Mass nne$, ur nepcarak yiwen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:3: U Neppa, gedha s loeôs n Mass nne$ Aâlayan, ur Isâi tameddakwelt, ne$ ùùmmi S!
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:4: Ih, abuhal nne$ iêekku, af Öebbi, ixmiôen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:5: Nekwni nenwa leonun akked imdanen, ur sawalen, af Öebbi, tikerkas, d awez$i.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:6: Ih, seg imdanen, llan irgazen ijjemen ddkeô n leonun. Snernan lbe$wv nnsen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:7: S tidep, $ilen, akken t$ilem, ar Öebbi ur d Isskar yiwen, d awez$i.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:8: Aql a$ nqelleb igenni, nufa t iççuô d iâssasen uqsiêen, akked ijujaê.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:9: Nella nep$imi $uôes, seg imukan nessemêas; win issemêessen tura, a t id immager usafu d aâessas.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:10: Nekwni, ur neéôi ma iura lhemm, af at ddunit, ne$ ma Ib$a, Mass nnsen, ad pwanhun.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:11: Llan garane$ iâaôviyen, llan wid ur nemâin; ur naâdil iberdan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:12: Nmeyyez nufa, war ccekk, ur nesfunnug Öebbi di tmurt, ur T nesfunnug ma nerwel.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:13: Nnhaya mi s nesla, yis numen. Win iumnen s Mass is, ur ippagwad ara t ixaûen, ne$ ara t ivuôôen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:14: Ih, garane$ imvuâen, garane$ lâaûûap. Wid iunzen, widak, xtaôen lewqam.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:15: Ma d lâaûûap, di Loahennama, d nitni ay d is$aôen".
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:16: Lemmer deg ubrid ay ddan, yili Nefka yasen aman iqwan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:17: A ten njeôôeb yissen. Win iooan asmekti n Mass is, ad isâaddi aâaqeb aqesêan.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:18: Leowamaâ n Öebbi. Ur naâôet yiwen ar tama n Öebbi.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:19: Atan, mi ikker umdan n Öebbi ad inuj $ureS, qôib lesqen $uôes.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:20: Ini: "pnuju$ kan ar Mass iw, ur aS pcarake$ yiwen".
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:21: Ini: "nek, ur pwakelfe$ $ef vveôô nnwen ne$ $ef nnhaya nnwen".
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:22: Ini: "nek, ur iyi ipfukku yiwen seg ufus n Öebbi, d awez$i. War Neppa, ur ppafe$ ssôan,
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:23: siwa anabi s$uô Öebbi, akked tebrap iS". Ih, i wid iâuûan Öebbi akked Umazan iS, times n Loahennama, ad wekkôen degs, i lebda.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:24: Alamma mi walan ayen i sen ippuwaââden, ad éôen anwi ay d uôhifen mavi, i leslak, anwi drus iten mavi.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:25: Ini: "ur éôi$ ma iqeôb ed wayen i wen ippuweââden, ne$ ma a t Iweooel Mass iw;
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:26: Amusnaw n tbavnit; tabavnit iS, ur p Immal i yiwen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:27: Kkes ed win Iôuva d amazan. Winna, iteddu, zdat deffir, s iâssasen.
Berber Amazigh.verse 72:28: Ad Iéeô ma ssawven tibratin n Mass nnsen. Izzi i wayen akw illan $uôsen, Iêeppeb yal cci s imvanen.

Bosnian.verse 72:1: Reci: "Meni je objavljeno da je nekoliko džina prisluškivalo i reklo: 'Mi smo, doista, Kur'an, koji izaziva divljenje, slušali,
Bosnian.verse 72:2: koji na Pravi put upućuje – i mi smo u nj povjerovali i više nikoga nećemo Gospodaru našem ravnim smatrati,
Bosnian.verse 72:3: a On nije – neka uzvišeno bude dostojanstvo Gospodara našeg! – uzeo Sebi ni drúge ni djeteta;
Bosnian.verse 72:4: jedan naš bezumnik je o Allahu laži govorio,
Bosnian.verse 72:5: a mi smo mislili da ni ljudi ni džini o Allahu laži ne govore;
Bosnian.verse 72:6: i bilo je ljudi koji su pomoć od džina tražili, pa su im tako obijest povećali;
Bosnian.verse 72:7: i oni misle, kao što i vi mislite, da Allah nikoga neće oživiti;
Bosnian.verse 72:8: i mi smo nastojali da nebo dotaknemo i utvrdili smo da je moćnih čuvara i zvijezda padalica puno;
Bosnian.verse 72:9: i sjedili smo okolo njega po busijama da bismo što čuli, ali će onaj, ko sada prisluškuje, na zvijezdu padalicu koja vreba naići;
Bosnian.verse 72:10: i mi ne znamo da li se onima na Zemlji želi zlo ili im Gospodar njihov želi dobro;
Bosnian.verse 72:11: a među nama ima i dobrih i onih koji to nisu, ima nas vrsta različitih;
Bosnian.verse 72:12: i mi znamo da ne možemo Allahu na Zemlji umaći i da od Njega ne možemo pobjeći;
Bosnian.verse 72:13: i mi smo, čim smo Kur'an čuli, u nj povjerovali; a ko u Gospodara svoga vjeruje, ni štete ni nepravde ne treba se bojati;
Bosnian.verse 72:14: i ima nas muslimana, a ima nas zalutalih; oni koji islam prihvate Pravi put su izabrali,
Bosnian.verse 72:15: a nevjernici će u Džehennemu gorivo biti.'"
Bosnian.verse 72:16: A da se Pravog puta drže, Mi bismo ih vodom obilnom pojili,
Bosnian.verse 72:17: da bismo ih time na kušnju stavili; a onoga ko neće da se Gospodaru svome klanja On će patnju tešku uvesti.
Bosnian.verse 72:18: Džamije su Allaha radi, i ne molite se, pored Allaha, nikome!
Bosnian.verse 72:19: A kad je Allahov rob ustao da Mu se pomoli, oni su se u gomilama oko njega tiskati stali.
Bosnian.verse 72:20: Reci: "Ja se samo Gospodaru svome klanjam, i nikoga Njemu ravnim ne smatram."
Bosnian.verse 72:21: Reci: "Ja nisam u stanju da od vas kakvu štetu otklonim niti da nekom od vas kakvu korist pribavim."
Bosnian.verse 72:22: Reci: "Mene niko od Allahove kazne ne može u zaštitu uzeti; samo u Njega ja mogu utočište naći –
Bosnian.verse 72:23: samo mogu oglasiti ono što je od Allaha i poslanice Njegove." A onoga koji Allahu i Poslaniku Njegovu ne bude poslušan sigurno čeka vatra džehennemska; u njoj će vječno i zauvijek ostati.
Bosnian.verse 72:24: I kada oni dožive ono čime im se prijeti, saznaće ko je slabiji i brojem manji.
Bosnian.verse 72:25: Reci: "Ja ne znam da li će uskoro biti ono čime vam se prijeti ili je Gospodar moj odredio da će to poslije dugo vremena biti,
Bosnian.verse 72:26: On tajne zna i On tajne Svoje ne otkriva nikome,
Bosnian.verse 72:27: osim onome koga On za poslanika odabere; zato On i ispred njega i iza njega postavlja one koji će ga čuvati
Bosnian.verse 72:28: da bi pokazao da su poslanice Gospodara svoga dostavili, On u tančine zna ono što je u njih, On zna broj svega što postoji.

Bulgarian.verse 72:1: Кажи [о, Мухаммад]: “Разкрито ми бе, че няколко джинове слушали и рекли: “Чухме удивителен Коран.
Bulgarian.verse 72:2: Насочва той към правия път. Затова повярвахме в него и никого не ще съдружим с нашия Господ.
Bulgarian.verse 72:3: Той - превисоко е величието на нашия Господ! - не се е сдобивал нито със съпруга, нито със син.
Bulgarian.verse 72:4: Глупците измежду нас говорят измислици за Аллах.
Bulgarian.verse 72:5: А ние предполагахме, че хората и джиновете никога не ще изрекат лъжа за Аллах.
Bulgarian.verse 72:6: Някои хора търсеха убежище при някои джинове, а [хората] им надбавиха безразсъдство.
Bulgarian.verse 72:7: И [хората] предполагаха, както и вие предполагахте, че Аллах не ще възкреси никого.
Bulgarian.verse 72:8: И досегнахме небето, и открихме, че е пълно със силна стража и с изгарящи звезди.
Bulgarian.verse 72:9: А преди седяхме там на места, за да подслушваме. А който подслушва сега, дебне го изгаряща звезда.
Bulgarian.verse 72:10: И не знаем дали зло е поискано за онези, които са на земята, или техният Господ е поискал добро за тях.
Bulgarian.verse 72:11: Сред нас има правдиви, сред нас има и други освен това. Следваме различни пътища.
Bulgarian.verse 72:12: Вече сме убедени, че никога не ще обезсилим Аллах на земята и никога не ще Го обезсилим, дори да бягаме.
Bulgarian.verse 72:13: И когато чухме Напътствието, повярвахме в него. А който вярва в своя Господ, да не се страхува нито от ощетяване, нито от угнетяване.
Bulgarian.verse 72:14: Сред нас има отдали се на Аллах [мюсюлмани], но сред нас има и отклонили се [неверници]. Онези, които са се отдали на Аллах - те са избрали правия път.
Bulgarian.verse 72:15: А отклонилите се - те са горивото за Ада.”
Bulgarian.verse 72:16: И ако се бяха придържали към правия път, Ние щяхме да им дадем вода в изобилие,
Bulgarian.verse 72:17: за да ги изпитаме с това. А който се отдръпва от споменаването на своя Господ, Той ще го въведе в тежко мъчение.
Bulgarian.verse 72:18: Джамиите са само за Аллах и затова не зовете никой друг заедно с Аллах!
Bulgarian.verse 72:19: Когато рабът на Аллах [Мухаммад] се изправи да Го позове, те едва не се струпаха около него на пълчища.
Bulgarian.verse 72:20: Кажи: “Зова единствено моя Господ и никого не съдружавам с Него.”
Bulgarian.verse 72:21: Кажи: “Аз нито мога да ви навредя, нито да ви бъда от полза.”
Bulgarian.verse 72:22: Кажи: “Никой не може да ме защити от Аллах и не ще намеря убежище освен при Него.
Bulgarian.verse 72:23: Аз предавам само известие от Аллах и Негови послания. А които не се подчиняват на Аллах и на Неговия Пратеник, за тях е Огънят на Ада, там ще пребивават вечно.”
Bulgarian.verse 72:24: Когато видят обещаното им, ще научат кой има по-слаби и по-малобройни помощници.
Bulgarian.verse 72:25: Кажи: “Не знам близо ли е това, което ви е обещано, или е сторил за него предел моят Господ -
Bulgarian.verse 72:26: Знаещия неведомото. Той на никого не разкрива Своите тайни,
Bulgarian.verse 72:27: освен на онзи пратеник, когото е избрал. И сторва Той пред него и зад него да има [ангели] пазители,
Bulgarian.verse 72:28: за да знае, че са съобщили посланията на своя Господ. Обгръща Той това, което е у тях, и пресмята всяко нещо.”

Chinese.verse 72:1: 你说：我曾奉到启示：有几个精灵已经静听，并且说：我们确已听见奇异的《古兰经》，
Chinese.verse 72:2: 它能导人於正道，故我们信仰它，我们绝不以任何物配我们的主。'
Chinese.verse 72:3: 赞颂我们的主的尊严！超绝万物，他没有择取妻室，也没有择取儿女。
Chinese.verse 72:4: 我们中的庸愚，常以悖谬的事诬蔑真主，
Chinese.verse 72:5: 我们曾猜想人和精灵绝不诬蔑真主。
Chinese.verse 72:6: 曾有一些男人，求些男精灵保护他们，因而使他们更加骄傲。
Chinese.verse 72:7: 那些男人曾像你们一样猜想真主绝不使任何死者复活。
Chinese.verse 72:8: 我们曾试探天，发现天上布满坚强的卫士和灿烂的星宿。
Chinese.verse 72:9: 过去，我们为窃听而常常坐在天上可坐的地方。现在谁去窃听，谁就发现一颗灿烂的星宿在等著他。
Chinese.verse 72:10: 我们不知道，究竟是大地上的万物将遭患难呢？还是他们的主欲引他们於正道呢？
Chinese.verse 72:11: 我们中有善良的，有次於善良的，我们是分为许多派别的。
Chinese.verse 72:12: 我们相信，我们在大地上，绝不能使真主无奈，也绝不能逃避真主的谴责。
Chinese.verse 72:13: 当我们听见正道的时候，我们已信仰它。谁信仰主，谁不怕克扣，也不怕受辱。
Chinese.verse 72:14: 我们中有顺服的，有乖张的。凡顺服的，都是有志於正道的。
Chinese.verse 72:15: 至於乖张的，将作火狱的燃料。
Chinese.verse 72:16: 假如他们遵循正道，我必赏赐他们的丰富的雨水，
Chinese.verse 72:17: 以便我以雨水考验他们。谁退避主的教训，他将使谁入在严峻的刑罚中。
Chinese.verse 72:18: 一切清真寺，都是真主的，故你们应当祈祷真主，不要祈祷任何物。
Chinese.verse 72:19: 当真主的仆人起来祈祷的时候，他们几乎群起而攻之。
Chinese.verse 72:20: 你说：我只祈祷我的主，我不以任何物配他。
Chinese.verse 72:21: 你说：我不能为你们主持祸福。
Chinese.verse 72:22: 你说：任何人不能保护我不受真主的惩罚；除真主外，我绝不能发现任何避难所。
Chinese.verse 72:23: 我只能传达从真主降示的通知和使命。谁违抗真主和使者，谁必受火狱的刑罚，而且永居其中。
Chinese.verse 72:24: 待他们看见他们所被警告的刑罚的时候，他们就知道谁是更寡助的。
Chinese.verse 72:25: 你说：我不知道你们被警告的刑罚是临近的呢？还是我的主将为它规定一个期限呢？
Chinese.verse 72:26: 他是全知幽玄的，他不让任何人窥见他的幽玄，
Chinese.verse 72:27: 除非他所喜悦的使者，因为他派遣卫队，在使者的前面和后面行走，
Chinese.verse 72:28: 以便他知道使者确已传达了他们的主的使命，并且周知他们所有的言行，而且统计万物的数目。

Danish.verse 72:1: Zeg: Het is aan mij geopenbaard dat een groep der djinn heeft geluisterd (naar de Koran), en zij zeiden: Waarlijk, wij hebben een wonderbaarlijke verkondiging gehoord
Danish.verse 72:2: Die tot rechtschapenheid leidt; daarom hebben wij er in geloofd, en wij zullen stellig niemand met onze Heer vereenzelvigen
Danish.verse 72:3: En de Majesteit van onze Heer is hoog verheven. Hij heeft noch echtgenote noch zoon
Danish.verse 72:4: En voorzeker, de dwaas onder ons placht over Allah leugen te spreken
Danish.verse 72:5: Doch wij hadden gemeend dat mensen en djinn nooit een leugen over Allah zouden uiten
Danish.verse 72:6: Voorzeker, waren er enige mensen die toevlucht bij sommige djinn zochten, waardoor zij hun zonden vermeerderden
Danish.verse 72:7: En zij meenden inderdaad, zoals gij meendet, dat Allah nooit een boodschapper zou zenden
Danish.verse 72:8: En wij trachtten de hemel te bespieden en wij vonden deze vol sterke wachters en vlammen
Danish.verse 72:9: En voorzeker, wij plachten op enige plaatsen te zitten om de gesprekken te beluisteren. Maar wie nu luistert, vindt een vlam die op hem wacht
Danish.verse 72:10: Wij weten daardoor niet of voor degenen die op aarde zijn, een ramp wordt bedoeld of dat hun Heer hen op het goede pad wil leiden
Danish.verse 72:11: Er zijn onder ons die rechtvaardig zijn en er zijn onder ons die anders zijn en wij volgen verschillende wegen
Danish.verse 72:12: En wij beseffen dat wij Allah`s (plan) op aarde onmogelijk kunnen verijdelen, noch kunnen wij Hem door de vlucht ontlopen
Danish.verse 72:13: En toen wij de leiding hoorden, geloofden wij er in. En hij, die gelooft in zijn Heer, heeft geen vrees voor verlies of onrecht
Danish.verse 72:14: En er zijn onder ons Moslims en er zijn onder ons die van de rechte weg zijn afgeweken. En zij die zich onderwerpen - hebben de rechte weg gezocht
Danish.verse 72:15: En zij die van de rechte weg afwijken, zullen brandstof der hel zijn
Danish.verse 72:16: Indien zij zich aan het rechte pad houden zullen Wij hun water in overvloed te drinken geven
Danish.verse 72:17: Om hen daarmee op de proef te stellen. En wie zich van de gedachte aan zijn Heer afwendt, Hij zal hem een toenemende straf toedienen
Danish.verse 72:18: En zeg: Alle bedehuizen behoren aan Allah; roept daarom niemand naast Allah aan
Danish.verse 72:19: En toen de dienaar van Allah opstond om Hem te aanbidden, vielen zij hem bijna aan
Danish.verse 72:20: Zeg: Ik bid alleen tot mijn Heer en ik vereenzelvig niemand met Hem
Danish.verse 72:21: Zeg: Ik heb (uit mijzelf) geen macht u goed of kwaad te doen
Danish.verse 72:22: Zeg: Voorzeker, niemand kan mij tegen Allah beschermen, noch kan ik een andere schuilplaats vinden buiten Hem
Danish.verse 72:23: (Mij is) slechts de verkondiging van Allah`s boodschap opgedragen. En voor degenen die Allah en Zijn boodschapper niet gehoorzamen is het Vuur der hel, waarin zij lange tijd zullen vertoeven
Danish.verse 72:24: Tot zij de straf zien waarmee zij worden bedreigd, maar dan zullen zij ook weten wie zwakkere helpers en kleiner aantal heeft
Danish.verse 72:25: Zeg hun: Ik weet niet of hetgeen waarmede gij bedreigd wordt nabij is of wel dat mijn Heer het zal uitstellen voor een lange tijd
Danish.verse 72:26: Hij is de Kenner van het onzienlijke en Hij geeft niemand overvloedig kennis van Zijn geheimen
Danish.verse 72:27: Behalve hem die Hij als boodschapper kiest. Dan doet Hij een wacht vóór hem en achter hem gaan
Danish.verse 72:28: Opdat Hij moge weten dat zij (Zijn boodschappers) de boodschappen van hun Heer hebben overgebracht. En Hij omvat alles wat met hen is - en Hij heeft alles berekend

Dutch.verse 72:1: Zeg (O Moehammad): "Het is aan mij geopenbaard dat een aantal Djinn's heeft meegeluisterd, waarop zij zeiden: "Voorwaar, Wij hebben een verbazingwekkende Koran gehoord.
Dutch.verse 72:2: Hij (de Koran) leidt tot het juiste, toen geloofden wij erin, en wij zullen nooit één deelgenoot aan onze Heer toekennen.
Dutch.verse 72:3: En dat de Majesteit van onze Heer Verheven is, Hij heeft Zich geen echtgenote genomen en geen zoon.
Dutch.verse 72:4: En dat de dwazen onder ons plachten leugens te vertellen over Allah.
Dutch.verse 72:5: En dat wij dachten dat de mens en de Djinn's nooit leugens over Allah zouden vertellen.
Dutch.verse 72:6: En dat er mannen onder de mensen waren die hulp zochten bij mannen van de Djinn's, wat hun zondigheid vermeerderde.
Dutch.verse 72:7: En dat zij dachten zoals jullie dachten: dat Allah nooit iemand zou doen opstaan.
Dutch.verse 72:8: En dat wij hebben gevraagd naar de hemel (te mogen gaan): toen vonden wij dat zij vol was met strenge bewakers en brandende vlammen.
Dutch.verse 72:9: En dat, wij vroeger (vóór de Koran) op geheime plaatsen zaten om mee te luisteren, maar wie nu wil meeluisteren treft een pijl van vuur aan die op hem loert.
Dutch.verse 72:10: En dat wij niet weten of er kwaad bedoeld wordt voor degenen die op de aarde zijn, of dat hun Heer hun rechte Leiding wil geven.
Dutch.verse 72:11: En dat er onder ons rechtschapenen zijn, en er onder ons zijn die dat niet zijn. Wij waren op verschillende wegen.
Dutch.verse 72:12: En dat wij overtuigd zijn dat wij op de aarde Allah nooit kunnen ontkomen en dat wij nooit van Hem kunnen wegvluchten.
Dutch.verse 72:13: En dat, toen wij over de rechte Leiding hadden gehoord, wij erin geloofden. En wie in zijn Heer gelooft; hij zal geen vermindering (van beloning) en geen vermeerdering (van zondigheid) vrezen.
Dutch.verse 72:14: En dat er onder ons zijn die zich aan Allah hebben overgegeven, en er onder ons zijn die afwijken (van het rechte Pad). Wie zich heeft overgegeven: zij zijn degenen die de rechte Leiding gekozen hebben.
Dutch.verse 72:15: Maar wat de afwijkenden betreft: zij zijn brandhout voor de Hel."
Dutch.verse 72:16: (En Allah zegt:) "Als zij op het rechte Pad zouden zijn gebleven, dan zouden Wij hun overvloedig water te drinken gegeven hebben.
Dutch.verse 72:17: Om hen daarmee te beproeven. En wie zich afwendt van de gedachtenis van zijn Heer, die voert Hij naar een zware bestraffing."
Dutch.verse 72:18: En voorwaar, de moskeeën behoren aan Allah toe: roept dan naast Allah niet één aan.
Dutch.verse 72:19: En voorwaar, wanneer de dienaar van Allah (Moehammed) in de shalât staat en Hem aanroept, dan bedelven zij (de Djinn's) hem bijna.
Dutch.verse 72:20: Zeg: "Ik roep alleen mijn Heer aan en ik ken Hem in niets deelgenoten toe."
Dutch.verse 72:21: Zeg: "Ik heb geen macht om voor jullie schade te voorkomen en niet om Leiding te geven."
Dutch.verse 72:22: Zeg: "Niemand zal mij ooit tegen Allah kunnen redden en ik zal nooit naast Hem een toevluchtsoord vinden.
Dutch.verse 72:23: (Ik vind een toevluchtsoord) van Allah slechts door de verkondiging van Zijn Boodschappen." En wie opstaat tegen Allah en Zijn Boodschapper: voor hen is er het vuur van de Hel. Zij zijn daarin eeuwig levenden, voor altijd.
Dutch.verse 72:24: Wanneer zij dan zien wat hun is aangezegd, dan zullen zij weten wie de zwakste helpers heeft en het kleinst in aantal is.
Dutch.verse 72:25: Zeg: "Ik weet niet of het nabij is, wat jullie aangezegd is, of dat mijn Heer het nog lang uitstelt."
Dutch.verse 72:26: De Kenner van het onwaarneembare, Hij maakt voor niemand het onwaarneembare dat bij Hem is zichtbaar.
Dutch.verse 72:27: Behalve aan een Boodschapper die Hem welgevallig is, en voorwaar, dan laat Hij vóór hem en achter hem wachters (Engelen) gaan.
Dutch.verse 72:28: Om te doen weten dat zij de Boodschappen van hun Heer overbrachten. En Hij omvat wat er bij hen is en Hij somt alle zaken nauwkeurig op.

English.verse 72:1: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
English.verse 72:2: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
English.verse 72:3: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
English.verse 72:4: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
English.verse 72:5: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
English.verse 72:6: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
English.verse 72:7: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
English.verse 72:8: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
English.verse 72:9: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
English.verse 72:10: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
English.verse 72:11: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
English.verse 72:12: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
English.verse 72:13: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
English.verse 72:14: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
English.verse 72:15: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
English.verse 72:16: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
English.verse 72:17: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
English.verse 72:18: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
English.verse 72:19: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
English.verse 72:20: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
English.verse 72:21: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
English.verse 72:22: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
English.verse 72:23: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
English.verse 72:24: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
English.verse 72:25: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
English.verse 72:26: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
English.verse 72:27: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
English.verse 72:28: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

Filipino.verse 72:1: Ipagbadya ( o Muhammad): “Ipinahayag sa akin na ang isang pangkat ng Jinn (na may bilang mula tatlo hanggang sampu) ay nakinig (sa Qur’an).” Sila ay nagsasabi: “Katotohanang aming napakinggan ang isang Maindayog at Kamangha-manghang Pagbigkas (sa Quran)!”
Filipino.verse 72:2: Na namamatnubay sa Tuwid na Landas (katuwiran at kagalingan), at kami ay sumampalataya rito at hindi kailanman kami ay magtatambal ng anuman (sa pagsamba) sa aming Panginoon (Allah)
Filipino.verse 72:3: At ganap na Kaluwalhatian ang Kataasan ng aming Panginoon. Siya (Allah) ay hindi nag-angkin sa Kanyang sarili ng asawa o ng anak (o mga supling o mga anak)
Filipino.verse 72:4: At ang mga luku- luko (at baliw) sa lipon namin (alalaong baga, si Iblis o ang mga Jinn na mapagsamba sa mga diyus-diyosan) ay nagpapahayag ng kasinungalingan laban kay Allah na hindi nararapat
Filipino.verse 72:5: Katotohanan! Ang sangkatauhan at mga Jinn ay hindi marapat na magturing ng kasinungalingan laban kay Allah
Filipino.verse 72:6: At katotohanan na may mga tao sa lipon ng sangkatauhan ang nananahan sa matitipunong mga tao sa gitna ng mga Jinn, datapuwa’t sila (Jinn) ay lalong naglulong (sa sangkatauhan) sa kasalanan at kawalan ng pananalig
Filipino.verse 72:7: At katotohanang sila ay nag-akala na katulad ng inyong pag-aakala na si Allah ay hindi magsusugo ng sinumang tagapagbalita (sa sangkatauhan at sa Jinn)
Filipino.verse 72:8: At ang mga Jinn ay nagsabi: “At kami ay sumilip (sa mga lihim) ng kalangitan, datapuwa’t aming natagpuan na tigib ito ng mga mahihigpit na tagapagbantay at naglalagablab na apoy.”
Filipino.verse 72:9: At katotohanang kami ay lagi nang nakaupo roon (sa nakukubling lugar) upang (makaulinig) ng mapapakinggan, datapuwa’t sinuman ang nakikinig ngayon ay makakatagpo ng isang naglalagablab na apoy na naghihintay sa kanya upang tambangan
Filipino.verse 72:10: At hindi namin napag-uunawa kung ang kasamaan (o panganib) ay nakalaan sa lahat ng nasa kalupaan, o kung ang kanilang Panginoon ay nagnanais na sila ay patnubayan sa Tuwid na Landas
Filipino.verse 72:11: At sa karamihan namin ay mayroong ilan na matutuwid (sa asal) at ang ilan ay malayo sa (matutuwid na asal). Kami ay mga pangkatin na sumusunod sa magkakahiwalay na landas (iba’t ibang sekta ng pananampalataya, atbp)
Filipino.verse 72:12: At nababatid namin na kami ay hindi makakatakas sa (kaparusahan) ni Allah dito sa kalupaan, at hindi rin kami makakawala (sa kaparusahan) sa pamamagitan ng pagtakas
Filipino.verse 72:13: At katotohanan na aming napakinggan ang Pahayag (Qur’an), kami ay nagsisampalataya rito (sa Kaisahan ni Allah), at sinuman ang manampalataya sa kanyang Panginoon ay walang ipangangamba maging ito man ay sa pagkabawas ng gantimpala sa kanyang mabubuting gawa o sa dagdag na kaparusahan sa kanyang mga kasalanan. ** Mga nilikha ni Allah na hindi natin nakikita, subalit katulad din ng mga tao ay may pananagutan sa kanilang gawa, may kalayaan sila na gumawa ng mabuti at masama, ang sumunod o sumuway kay Allah at sa Kanyang kautusan, at sa kanila ay may paghuhukom din na darating at may kabayaran ng gantimpala o kaparusahan ayon sa kanilang ginawa
Filipino.verse 72:14: At ang ilan sa karamihan namin ay mga Muslim (na nagsuko ng kanilang kalooban kay Allah matapos na makinig sa Qur’an), at may mga ilan sa karamihan namin ay Al-Qasitun (mga walang pananalig at lumihis sa Tuwid na Landas). At sinuman ang magsuko ng kanyang kalooban kay Allah (alalaong baga, ang yumakap sa Islam), katotohanang sila ay nagkamit ng Tuwid na Landas (sa mabuting asal)
Filipino.verse 72:15: At sa Qasitun (mga walang pananalig at katarungan na lumihis sa Tuwid na Landas), sila ang magiging panggatong (sa Apoy) ng Impiyerno
Filipino.verse 72:16: At kung sila (na sumasamba sa diyus-diyosan, hindi mga Muslim) ay sumampalataya kay Allah at namalagi lamang sa Tuwid na Landas (Islam), katotohanang Kami ay magkakaloob sa kanila ng saganang ulan
Filipino.verse 72:17: Upang sila ay Aming masubukan sa gayong paraan. Datapuwa’t sinuman ang tumalikod sa Paala-ala ng kanyang Panginoon (alalaong baga, sa Qur’an at hindi nagsagawa sa mga batas at pag-uutos nito), ay igagawad Niya sa kanya ang pumasok sa Matinding Kaparusahan (Impiyerno)
Filipino.verse 72:18: At ang mga Moske o lugar ng pagpapatirapa (sa pagsamba) ay tanging kay Allah (lamang), kaya’t huwag manalangin sa sinuman (bilang kahati) ni Allah
Filipino.verse 72:19: (Ipinahayag sa akin) nang ang alipin ni Allah (Muhammad) ay tumindig sa paninikluhod (sa kanyang Panginoon, kay Allah) sa pananalangin, sila (na mga Jinn) ay pumalibot sa kanya sa makapal na lipon na wari bang sila ay dikit-dikit sa isa’t isa (upang sila ay makinig sa pagdalit ng Propeta)
Filipino.verse 72:20: Ipagbadya ( o Muhammad): “Ako ay nananalangin lamang sa aking Panginoon (kay Allah lamang), at ako ay hindi nagtatambal sa Kanya ng iba pang huwad na diyos.”
Filipino.verse 72:21: Ipagbadya: “Katotohanang ako ay walang kapamahalaan upang ilagay kayo sa kapahamakan, o dalhin kayo sa Tuwid na Landas.”
Filipino.verse 72:22: (Ipagbadya O Muhammad): “Katotohanang walang makakapagligtas sa akin sa kaparusahan ni Allah (kung ako ay susuway sa kanya), gayundin, ako ay hindi makakatagpo ng kaligtasan maliban sa Kanya.”
Filipino.verse 72:23: (Ang aking tungkulin ) ay iparating sa inyo (ang Katotohanan) na mula kay Allah at sa Kanyang Kapahayagan (Kaisahan ni Allah), at sinumang sumuway kay Allah at sa Kanyang Tagapagbalita, kung gayon, katotohanang sasakanya ang Apoy ng Impiyerno, mananahan siya rito magpakailanman
Filipino.verse 72:24: Hanggang sa sumapit ang Araw na itatambad (sa harap ng kanilang mga mata) ang bagay na sa kanila ay ipinangako (na kanilang pinag-aalinlanganan), ay mapag- aalaman nila kung sino ang mahina (sa kanyang) kapanalig (kawaksi) at walang halaga sa (karamihan) ng bilang
Filipino.verse 72:25: Ipagbadya ( O Muhammad ): “Hindi ko nababatid kung ang kaparusahan na ipinangako sa inyo ay nalalapit na, o kung ang Panginoon ay magtatakda roon sa matagal pang panahon.”
Filipino.verse 72:26: Siya lamang ang lubos na nakakatalastas ng Al-Ghaib (mga nakalingid at Kabilang Buhay) at hindi Niya ipinahahayag sa kaninuman ang Kanyang Ghaib (lihim at nakalingid)
Filipino.verse 72:27: Maliban sa isang Tagapagbalita (sa sangkatauhan) na Kanyang hinirang (Siya ay nagpapahayag sa kanya sa Kanyang nais), at nagtalaga Siya ng pangkat ng tagapagbantay (mga anghel) upang manguna sa kanyang harapan at kanyang likuran
Filipino.verse 72:28: Siya [Allah] ang nangangalaga sa kanila [mga Tagapagbalita]), hanggang sa Kanyang mamalas na katotohanang ipinahayag nila (mga Tagapagbalita) ang Kapahayagan (Tagubilin) ng kanilang Panginoon. At Kanyang nilulukuban ang lahat ng nasa kanilang (paghahawak), at Siya ang naghahawak sa pagsusulit ng lahat ng bagay (alalaong baga, lubos Niyang batid ang ganap na bilang ng bawat bagay). siyA nA nABABAlutAn ng kAsuutAn

French.verse 72:1: Dis: «Il m'a été révélé qu'un groupe de djinns prêtèrent l'oreille, puis dirent: «Nous avons certes entendu une Lecture [le Coran] merveilleuse,
French.verse 72:2: qui guide vers la droiture. Nous y avons cru, et nous n'associerons jamais personne à notre Seigneur.
French.verse 72:3: En vérité notre Seigneur - que Sa grandeur soit exaltée - ne S'est donné ni compagne, ni enfant!
French.verse 72:4: Notre insensé [Iblis] disait des extravagances contre Allah.
French.verse 72:5: Et nous pensions que ni les humains ni les djinns ne sauraient jamais proférer de mensonge contre Allah.
French.verse 72:6: Or, il y avait parmi les humains, des mâles qui cherchaient protection auprès des mâles parmi les djinns mais cela ne fit qu'accroître leur détresse.
French.verse 72:7: Et ils avaient pensé comme vous avez pensé qu'Allah ne ressusciterait jamais personne.
French.verse 72:8: Nous avions frôlé le ciel et nous l'avions trouvé plein d'une forte garde et de bolides.
French.verse 72:9: Nous y prenions place pour écouter. Mais quiconque prête l'oreille maintenant, trouve contre lui un bolide aux aguets.
French.verse 72:10: Nous ne savons pas si on veut du mal aux habitants de la terre ou si leur Seigneur veut les mettre sur le droit chemin.
French.verse 72:11: Il y a parmi nous des vertueux et [d'autres] qui le sont moins: nous étions divisés en différentes sectes.
French.verse 72:12: Nous pensions bien que nous ne saurions jamais réduire Allah à l'impuissance sur la terre et que nous ne saurions jamais le réduire à l'impuissance en nous enfuyant.
French.verse 72:13: Et lorsque nous avons entendu le guide [le Coran], nous y avons cru, et quiconque croit en son Seigneur ne craint alors ni diminution de récompense ni oppression.
French.verse 72:14: Il y a parmi nous les Musulmans, et il y en a les injustes [qui ont dévié]. Et ceux qui se sont convertis à l'Islam sont ceux qui ont cherché la droiture.
French.verse 72:15: Et quant aux injustes, ils formeront le combustible de l'Enfer.
French.verse 72:16: Et s'ils se maintenaient dans la bonne direction, Nous les aurions abreuvés, certes d'une eau abondante,
French.verse 72:17: afin de les y éprouver. Et quiconque se détourne du rappel de son Seigneur, Il l'achemine vers un châtiment sans cesse croissant.
French.verse 72:18: Les mosquées sont consacrées à Allah: n'invoquez donc personne avec Allah.
French.verse 72:19: Et quand le serviteur d'Allah s'est mis debout pour L'invoquer, ils faillirent se ruer en masse sur lui.
French.verse 72:20: Dis: «Je n'invoque que mon Seigneur et ne Lui associe personne».
French.verse 72:21: Dis: «Je ne possède aucun moyen pour vous faire du mal, ni pour vous mettre sur le chemin droit».
French.verse 72:22: Dis: «Vraiment, personne ne saura me protéger contre Allah; et jamais je ne trouverai de refuge en dehors de Lui.
French.verse 72:23: [Je ne puis que transmettre] une communication et des messages [émanant] d'Allah. Et quiconque désobéit à Allah et à Son Messager aura le feu de l'Enfer pour y demeurer éternellement.
French.verse 72:24: Puis, quand ils verront ce dont on les menaçait, ils sauront lesquels ont les secours les plus faibles et [lesquels] sont les moins nombreux.
French.verse 72:25: Dis: «Je ne sais pas si ce dont vous êtes menacés est proche, ou bien, si mon Seigneur va lui assigner un délai.
French.verse 72:26: [C'est Lui] qui connaît le mystère. Il ne dévoile Son mystère à personne,
French.verse 72:27: sauf à celui qu'Il agrée comme Messager et qu'Il fait précéder et suivre de gardiens vigilants,
French.verse 72:28: afin qu'Il sache s'ils ont bien transmis les messages de leur Seigneur. Il cerne (de Son savoir) ce qui est avec eux, et dénombre exactement toute chose.

Fulah.verse 72:1: Maaku : "Wahayinaama e am, wonnde dental jinna heɗino [lam miɗo jannga Alqur`aana], ɗi wi`i: "Menen men nani janngeteende haawniinde
Fulah.verse 72:2: Hinde ɗowira e peewal. Men gomɗinii nde. Men kafidatah e Joomi amen, hay e gooto
Fulah.verse 72:3: E wonnde manngural Joomi amen ngal mawnii, O siforaali jogitagol genndo, wanaa ɓiɗɗo
Fulah.verse 72:4: E wonnde [Ibuliisa] ɗayɗo on e amen hino wowlaynoo penaale e hoore Allah
Fulah.verse 72:5: Menen men sikkuno wonnde yimɓe e jinna wowlataano fenaande e hoore Allah
Fulah.verse 72:6: Hari le worɓe yimɓe hino mooloraynoo worɓe jinna, ɓe ɓeydi ɗi bewre
Fulah.verse 72:7: Kamɓe [yimɓe ɓen] ɓe sikkir no sikkirɗon non, wonnde Allah immintintah hay gooto
Fulah.verse 72:8: E wonnde men meemii kammu ngun, men tawi hingu hebbiniraa aynooɓe tiiɗuɓe e docote
Fulah.verse 72:9: E wonnde meɗen jooɗotonoo ton fii heɗagol. Kala non heɗitiiɗo jooni, o hawray e docotal tommbingal
Fulah.verse 72:10: E wonnde men anndaa si ko bone faandanaa wonɓe ka leydi ɓen, kaa hara Joomi maɓɓe faandani ɓe peewal
Fulah.verse 72:11: E wonnde hino e amen moƴƴuɗi, hino e amen kadi ko jaasi ɗum. Hari meɗen e laawi seertuɗi
Fulah.verse 72:12: E wonnde men fellituno men laawotaako Allah ka hoore leydi, e wonnde men laawortaa Mo dogugol
Fulah.verse 72:13: E wonnde nde men nanunoo peewal nagl, men gomɗini ngal. Kala gomɗinɗo Joomi mun, on hulataa ɗuytaneede [moƴƴi] wanaa ɓeydaneede [bonɗi]
Fulah.verse 72:14: E wonnde hino e amen jebbiliiɗi, hino e amen kadi ooñiiɗi. Kala jebbilii ngii, ɗin ɗon faandike peewal
Fulah.verse 72:15: Ooñiiɗi ɗin kan, ɗi laatanike Jahannama on carmalle
Fulah.verse 72:16: E wonnde si ɓe ñiiɓuno e hoore laawol ngol, ko pellet, Men yarnayno ɓe ndiyam ɗuuɗuɗam
Fulah.verse 72:17: fii yo Men ndaarndoro ɓe heen. Kala ɗuurniiɗo e jantoore Joomi mun nden, O naaday mo e lette sattuɗe
Fulah.verse 72:18: E wonnde juulirɗe ɗen ko Allah heeranii. Wata on kafidu e Allah hay e gooto
Fulah.verse 72:19: E wonnde tuma jeyaaɗo Allah on darinoo himo rewa Mo, ɗi ɗeɓuno waɗɗondirgol e hoore makko
Fulah.verse 72:20: Maaku : "Anndee ko Joomi am (tun) mi rewata, mi kafidataa Mo kadi hay e gooto
Fulah.verse 72:21: Maaku : "Min on mi waawanaa on duñude lorra, wanaa fii pooɗugol nafa
Fulah.verse 72:22: Maaku : "Hay gooto waawaa daɗndugol lam e Allah; mi heɓataa ko woori Mo ƴooñorde
Fulah.verse 72:23: si wanaa yottingol immorde e Allah e nule Makko ɗen. Kala yedduɗo Allah e Nulaaɗo Makko on, haray ko Yiite Jahannama woodani mo, ɓe luttay e magge poomaa
Fulah.verse 72:24: Haa si ɓe yi`ii ko ɓe kammbirananoo kon, ɓe aray anndude ko hombo ɓuri lo’ude ballo, ɓuri kadi fanɗude limoore
Fulah.verse 72:25: Maaku : "Mi anndaa si ko kammbiranaɗon kon hino ɓadii, maa si Joomi am waɗanay ɗum dumunna
Fulah.verse 72:26: Ko O ganndo wirniiɗi. O ƴellintinantaa wirniiɗi Makko ɗin hay e gooto
Fulah.verse 72:27: si wanaa mo O welanaa e Nulaaɗo, O naadnay yeeso on e ɓaawo makko tommbotooɓe
Fulah.verse 72:28: fii yo o anndu wonnde ɓen yottinii nule Joomi maɓɓe ɗen. O huɓindorii (anndugol) ko woni ka maɓɓe kon, O mofti limoore kala huunde

German.verse 72:1: Sag: Mir ist (als Offenbarung) eingegeben worden, daß eine kleinere Schar Ginn zuhörte. Sie sagten: "Wir haben einen wunderbaren Qur'an gehört,
German.verse 72:2: der zur Besonnenheit leitet; so haben wir an ihn geglaubt, und wir werden unserem Herrn niemanden beigesellen.
German.verse 72:3: Und erhaben ist die Größe unseres Herrn. Er hat sich weder eine Gefährtin noch Kinder genommen.
German.verse 72:4: Und es pflegte der Tor unter uns etwas Abwegiges gegen Allah zu sagen.
German.verse 72:5: Und wir meinten, daß weder die Menschen noch die Ginn gegen Allah jemals eine Lüge sagen würden.
German.verse 72:6: Und (manche) Männer von den Menschen pflegten Zuflucht zu nehmen bei (einigen) Männern von den Ginn, doch mehrten sie so (bei) ihnen die Drangsal.
German.verse 72:7: Und sie meinten -, wie (auch) ihr meint -, daß Allah niemanden mehr (als Gesandten) schicken würde.
German.verse 72:8: Und wir haben den Himmel abgetastet, aber festgestellt, daß er mit strengen Wächtern und Leuchtkörpern gefüllt worden ist.
German.verse 72:9: Und wir pflegten ja an Stellen von ihm Sitze zum Abhören einzunehmen; wer aber jetzt abhört, der findet einen auf ihn wartenden Leuchtkörper.
German.verse 72:10: Und wir wissen doch nicht, ob für diejenigen auf der Erde Schlechtes gewollt wird oder ob ihr Herr sie zur Besonnenheit (führen) will.
German.verse 72:11: Und unter uns gibt es Rechtschaffene, und unter uns gibt es solche, die weniger rechtschaffen sind; wir sind getrennte(n) Wege(n gefolgt).
German.verse 72:12: Und wir meinten, daß wir uns auf der Erde Allah niemals entziehen können und daß wir uns Ihm niemals durch Flucht entziehen können.
German.verse 72:13: Und als wir die Rechtleitung hörten, glaubten wir daran. Wer an seinen Herrn glaubt, der befürchtet keine (Lohn)schmälerung und keine Drangsal.
German.verse 72:14: Und unter uns sind Gottergebene; und unter uns sind (vom rechten Weg) Abschweifende. Was nun jemanden angeht, der sich (Allah) ergeben hat, so bemüht er sich um (mehr) Besonnenheit.
German.verse 72:15: Was aber die (vom rechten Weg) Abschweifenden angeht, so werden sie Brennholz für die Hölle sein.
German.verse 72:16: Und wenn sie sich auf dem Weg recht verhielten, würden Wir ihnen wahrlich Wasser im Überfluß zu trinken geben,
German.verse 72:17: damit Wir sie dadurch der Versuchung aussetzen. Und wer sich von der Ermahnung seines Herrn abwendet, den wird Er in überwältigende Strafe stecken.
German.verse 72:18: Und die Gebetsstätten gehören doch Allah; so ruft neben Allah niemanden an.
German.verse 72:19: Und als Allahs Diener aufstand, um Ihn anzurufen, hätten sie ihn (alle) beinahe erdrückt."
German.verse 72:20: Sag: Ich rufe nur meinen Herrn an, und ich geselle Ihm niemanden bei.
German.verse 72:21: Sag: Ich vermag euch weder Schaden noch Besonnenheit (zu bringen).
German.verse 72:22: Sag: Niemand kann mir gegen Allah Schutz gewähren, und ich werde außer (bei) Ihm keinen Ort der Sicherheit finden.
German.verse 72:23: (Ich vermag) nur etwas zu übermitteln von Allah und Seinen Botschaften. Und wer sich Allah und Seinem Gesandten widersetzt, gewiß, für ihn wird es das Feuer der Hölle geben, ewig und auf immer darin zu bleiben.
German.verse 72:24: Wenn sie dann sehen, was ihnen versprochen worden ist, da werden sie wissen, wer die schwächeren Helfer und die geringere Zahl hat.
German.verse 72:25: Sag: Ich weiß nicht, ob das, was euch versprochen worden ist, nahe ist, oder ob mein Herr ihm eine (längere) Frist setzt,
German.verse 72:26: (Er,) der Kenner des Verborgenen - Er enthüllt niemandem das, was bei Ihm verborgen ist,
German.verse 72:27: außer dem Gesandten, den Er bewilligt; da läßt Er vor ihm und hinter ihm Wächter einhergehen,
German.verse 72:28: damit er weiß, ob sie wohl die Botschaften ihres Herrn ausgerichtet haben, und daß Er das, was bei ihnen ist, umfaßt, und Er die Zahl von allem erfaßt'.

Hausa.verse 72:1: Ka ce: "An yi wahayi zuwa gare ni cewa wasu jama'a na aljannu sun saurũri (karatuna), sai suka ce: Lalle ne mũ mun ji wani abin karantãwa (Alƙui'ãni), mai ban mãmãki."
Hausa.verse 72:2: "Yana nũni zuwa ga hanyar ƙwarai, sabõda haka mun yi ĩmãni da shi bã zã mu kõma bautã wa Ubangijinmu tãre da kõwa ba."
Hausa.verse 72:3: "Kuma lalle ne shĩ girman Ubangijinmu, Ya ɗaukaka, bai riƙi mãta ba, kuma bai riƙi ɗã ba."
Hausa.verse 72:4: "Kuma lalle ne shi, wãwanmu ya kasance yana faɗar abin da ya ƙetare haddi ga Allah."
Hausa.verse 72:5: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, mun yi zaton mutum da aljani bã zã su iya faɗar ƙarya ba ga Allah."
Hausa.verse 72:6: "Kuma lalle ne shi wasu maza daga cikin mutãne, sun kasance sunã nẽman tsari da wasu maza daga cikin aljannu, sabõda haka suka ƙara musu girman kai."
Hausa.verse 72:7: "Kuma lalle ne sũ, sun yi zato, kamar yadda kuka yi zato, cewa Allah bã zai aiko kowa ba."
Hausa.verse 72:8: "Kuma lalle ne mũ mun nẽmi (hawan) sama, sai muka, sãme ta an cika ta da tsaro mai tsanani da kuma yũlãye."
Hausa.verse 72:9: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, mun kasance muna zama daga garẽta, a wurãren zama dõmin saurare. To wanda ya yi saurãre a yanzu, zai sãmi yũla, mai dãko dõminsa."
Hausa.verse 72:10: "Kuma lalle ne mũ ba mu sani ba, shin, sharri ne aka yi nufi ga waɗanda ke cikin ƙasa, ko Ubangijinsu Yã yi nufin shiriya a gare su ne?"
Hausa.verse 72:11: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, akwai sãlaihai a cikinmu, kuma akwai a cikinmu waɗanda ba haka bã mun kasance ƙungiyõyi dabam-dabam."
Hausa.verse 72:12: "Kuma lalle ne mũ mun tabbatã bã zã mu buwãyi Allah ba, a cikin ƙasa, kuma bã zã mu buwãye Shi da gudu ba."
Hausa.verse 72:13: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, a lõkacin da muka ji shiriya, mun yi ĩmãni da ita. To wanda ya yi ĩimãni da Uhangijinsa, bã zai ji tsõron nakkasa ba, kuma bã zai ji tsõron zãlunci ba."
Hausa.verse 72:14: "Kuma lalle ne mũ akwai a cikinmu, waɗanda suka mĩƙa wuya, kuma akwai a cikinmu karkatattu. to, wanda ya mĩƙa wuya waɗancan kam sun nufi shiryuwa."
Hausa.verse 72:15: "Kuma amma karkatattu sai suka kasance makãmashi ga Jahannama."
Hausa.verse 72:16: "Kuma dã sun tsayu sõsai a kan hanya, dã lalle Mun shãyar da su ruwa mai yawa."
Hausa.verse 72:17: "Domin Mu jarraba su a ciki, kuma wanda ya kau da kai daga tuna Ubangijinsa, Ubangijinsa zai shigar da shi azãba mai hauhawa."
Hausa.verse 72:18: "Kuma lalle ne wurãren sujada na Allah ne, saboda haka kada ku kira kõwa tãre da Allah (da su, a cikinsu)."
Hausa.verse 72:19: "Kuma, lalle ne shi, a lõkacin da bãwan Allah ke kiran Sa sun yi kusa su zama kamar shirgi a kansa."
Hausa.verse 72:20: Ka ce: "lna kiran Ubangijina ne kawai, kuma bã zan tãra kowa da Shi ba."
Hausa.verse 72:21: Ka ce: "Lalle ne, nĩ bã ni mallakar wata cũta gare ku, kuma bã ni mallakar wani alhẽri."
Hausa.verse 72:22: Ka ce: "Lalle ne, nĩ kõwa bã ya iya cẽtona daga Allah, kuma bã zan iya sãmun mafaka ba daga gare Shi."
Hausa.verse 72:23: "Fãce iyarwa, daga Allah, da manzancinsa. To, wanda ya sãɓa wa Allah da ManzonSa, to, lalle yana da wutar Jahannama suna mãsu dawwama a cikinta, har abada."
Hausa.verse 72:24: Har idan sun ga abin da ake yi musu gargaɗi da shi, to, zã su san wanda ya zama mafi raunin mataimaki da mafi ƙarancin adadi.
Hausa.verse 72:25: Ka ce: "Ban sani ba a kusa ne abin da ake yi muku gargaɗi da shi, ko Ubangijina Ya sanya maSa dõgon ajali!"
Hausa.verse 72:26: "Shi ɗai ne Masanin fake sabõda haka, bã Ya bayyana gaibinSa ga kowa."
Hausa.verse 72:27: "Fãce ga wanda Yã yarda da shi, wato wani manzo sa'an nan lalle ne, zai sanya gãdi a gaba gare shi da bãya gare shi."
Hausa.verse 72:28: "Dõmin Ya san lalle, sun iyar da sãƙonnin Ubangijinsu, kuma (Shi Ubangijin) Yã kẽwaye su da sani, kuma Yã lissafe dukan kõme da ƙididdiga."

Hindi.verse 72:1: (ऐ रसूल लोगों से) कह दो कि मेरे पास 'वही' आयी है कि जिनों की एक जमाअत ने (क़ुरान को) जी लगाकर सुना तो कहने लगे कि हमने एक अजीब क़ुरान सुना है
Hindi.verse 72:2: जो भलाई की राह दिखाता है तो हम उस पर ईमान ले आए और अब तो हम किसी को अपने परवरदिगार का शरीक न बनाएँगे
Hindi.verse 72:3: और ये कि हमारे परवरदिगार की शान बहुत बड़ी है उसने न (किसी को) बीवी बनाया और न बेटा बेटी
Hindi.verse 72:4: और ये कि हममें से बाज़ बेवकूफ ख़ुदा के बारे में हद से ज्यादा लग़ो बातें निकाला करते थे
Hindi.verse 72:5: और ये कि हमारा तो ख्याल था कि आदमी और जिन ख़ुदा की निस्बत झूठी बात नहीं बोल सकते
Hindi.verse 72:6: और ये कि आदमियों में से कुछ लोग जिन्नात में से बाज़ लोगों की पनाह पकड़ा करते थे तो (इससे) उनकी सरकशी और बढ़ गयी
Hindi.verse 72:7: और ये कि जैसा तुम्हारा ख्याल है वैसा उनका भी एतक़ाद था कि ख़ुदा हरगिज़ किसी को दोबारा नहीं ज़िन्दा करेगा
Hindi.verse 72:8: और ये कि हमने आसमान को टटोला तो उसको भी बहुत क़वी निगेहबानों और शोलो से भरा हुआ पाया
Hindi.verse 72:9: और ये कि पहले हम वहाँ बहुत से मक़ामात में (बातें) सुनने के लिए बैठा करते थे मगर अब कोई सुनना चाहे तो अपने लिए शोले तैयार पाएगा
Hindi.verse 72:10: और ये कि हम नहीं समझते कि उससे अहले ज़मीन के हक़ में बुराई मक़सूद है या उनके परवरदिगार ने उनकी भलाई का इरादा किया है
Hindi.verse 72:11: और ये कि हममें से कुछ लोग तो नेकोकार हैं और कुछ लोग और तरह के हम लोगों के भी तो कई तरह के फिरकें हैं
Hindi.verse 72:12: और ये कि हम समझते थे कि हम ज़मीन में (रह कर) ख़ुदा को हरगिज़ हरा नहीं सकते हैं और न भाग कर उसको आजिज़ कर सकते हैं
Hindi.verse 72:13: और ये कि जब हमने हिदायत (की किताब) सुनी तो उन पर ईमान लाए तो जो शख़्श अपने परवरदिगार पर ईमान लाएगा तो उसको न नुक़सान का ख़ौफ़ है और न ज़ुल्म का
Hindi.verse 72:14: और ये कि हम में से कुछ लोग तो फ़रमाबरदार हैं और कुछ लोग नाफ़रमान तो जो लोग फ़रमाबरदार हैं तो वह सीधे रास्ते पर चलें और रहें
Hindi.verse 72:15: नाफरमान तो वह जहन्नुम के कुन्दे बने
Hindi.verse 72:16: और (ऐ रसूल तुम कह दो) कि अगर ये लोग सीधी राह पर क़ायम रहते तो हम ज़रूर उनको अलग़ारों पानी से सेराब करते
Hindi.verse 72:17: ताकि उससे उनकी आज़माईश करें और जो शख़्श अपने परवरदिगार की याद से मुँह मोड़ेगा तो वह उसको सख्त अज़ाब में झोंक देगा
Hindi.verse 72:18: और ये कि मस्जिदें ख़ास ख़ुदा की हैं तो लोगों ख़ुदा के साथ किसी की इबादन न करना
Hindi.verse 72:19: और ये कि जब उसका बन्दा (मोहम्मद) उसकी इबादत को खड़ा होता है तो लोग उसके गिर्द हुजूम करके गिर पड़ते हैं
Hindi.verse 72:20: (ऐ रसूल) तुम कह दो कि मैं तो अपने परवरदिगार की इबादत करता हूँ और उसका किसी को शरीक नहीं बनाता
Hindi.verse 72:21: (ये भी) कह दो कि मैं तुम्हारे हक़ में न बुराई ही का एख्तेयार रखता हूँ और न भलाई का
Hindi.verse 72:22: (ये भी) कह दो कि मुझे ख़ुदा (के अज़ाब) से कोई भी पनाह नहीं दे सकता और न मैं उसके सिवा कहीं पनाह की जगह देखता हूँ
Hindi.verse 72:23: ख़ुदा की तरफ से (एहकाम के) पहुँचा देने और उसके पैग़ामों के सिवा (कुछ नहीं कर सकता) और जिसने ख़ुदा और उसके रसूल की नाफरमानी की तो उसके लिए यक़ीनन जहन्नुम की आग है जिसमें वह हमेशा और अबादुल आबाद तक रहेगा
Hindi.verse 72:24: यहाँ तक कि जब ये लोग उन चीज़ों को देख लेंगे जिनका उनसे वायदा किया जाता है तो उनको मालूम हो जाएगा कि किसके मददगार कमज़ोर और किसका शुमार कम है
Hindi.verse 72:25: (ऐ रसूल) तुम कह दो कि मैं नहीं जानता कि जिस दिन का तुमसे वायदा किया जाता है क़रीब है या मेरे परवरदिगार ने उसकी मुद्दत दराज़ कर दी है
Hindi.verse 72:26: (वही) ग़ैबवॉ है और अपनी ग़ैब की बाते किसी पर ज़ाहिर नहीं करता
Hindi.verse 72:27: मगर जिस पैग़म्बर को पसन्द फरमाए तो उसके आगे और पीछे निगेहबान फरिश्ते मुक़र्रर कर देता है
Hindi.verse 72:28: ताकि देख ले कि उन्होंने अपने परवरदिगार के पैग़ामात पहुँचा दिए और (यूँ तो) जो कुछ उनके पास है वह सब पर हावी है और उसने तो एक एक चीज़ गिन रखी हैं

Indonesian.verse 72:1: Katakanlah (hai Muhammad): "Telah diwahyukan kepadamu bahwasanya: telah mendengarkan sekumpulan jin (akan Al Quran), lalu mereka berkata: Sesungguhnya kami telah mendengarkan Al Quran yang menakjubkan,
Indonesian.verse 72:2: (yang) memberi petunjuk kapada jalan yang benar, lalu kami beriman kepadanya. Dan kami sekali-kali tidak akan mempersekutukan seseorangpun dengan Tuhan kami,
Indonesian.verse 72:3: dan bahwasanya Maha Tinggi kebesaran Tuhan kami, Dia tidak beristeri dan tidak (pula) beranak.
Indonesian.verse 72:4: Dan bahwasanya: orang yang kurang akal daripada kami selalu mengatakan (perkataan) yang melampaui batas terhadap Allah,
Indonesian.verse 72:5: dan sesungguhnya kami mengira, bahwa manusia dan jin sekali-kali tidak akan mengatakan perkataan yang dusta terhadap Allah.
Indonesian.verse 72:6: Dan bahwasanya ada beberapa orang laki-laki di antara manusia meminta perlindungan kepada beberapa laki-laki di antara jin, maka jin-jin itu menambah bagi mereka dosa dan kesalahan.
Indonesian.verse 72:7: Dan sesungguhnya mereka (jin) menyangka sebagaimana persangkaan kamu (orang-orang kafir Mekah), bahwa Allah sekali-kali tidak akan membangkitkan seorang (rasul)pun,
Indonesian.verse 72:8: dan sesungguhnya kami telah mencoba mengetahui (rahasia) langit, maka kami mendapatinya penuh dengan penjagaan yang kuat dan panah-panah api,
Indonesian.verse 72:9: dan sesungguhnya kami dahulu dapat menduduki beberapa tempat di langit itu untuk mendengar-dengarkan (berita-beritanya). Tetapi sekarang barangsiapa yang (mencoba) mendengar-dengarkan (seperti itu) tentu akan menjumpai panah api yang mengintai (untuk membakarnya).
Indonesian.verse 72:10: Dan sesungguhnya kami tidak mengetahui (dengan adanya penjagaan itu) apakah keburukan yang dikehendaki bagi orang yang di bumi ataukah Tuhan mereka menghendaki kebaikan bagi mereka.
Indonesian.verse 72:11: Dan sesungguhnya di antara kami ada orang-orang yang saleh dan di antara kami ada (pula) yang tidak demikian halnya. Adalah kami menempuh jalan yang berbeda-beda.
Indonesian.verse 72:12: Dan sesungguhnya kami mengetahui bahwa kami sekali-kali tidak akan dapat melepaskan diri (dari kekuasaan) Allah di muka bumi dan sekali-kali tidak (pula) dapat melepaskan diri (daripada)Nya dengan lari.
Indonesian.verse 72:13: Dan sesungguhnya kami tatkala mendengar petunjuk (Al Quran), kami beriman kepadanya. Barangsiapa beriman kepada Tuhannya, maka ia tidak takut akan pengurangan pahala dan tidak (takut pula) akan penambahan dosa dan kesalahan.
Indonesian.verse 72:14: Dan sesungguhnya di antara kami ada orang-orang yang taat dan ada (pula) orang-orang yang menyimpang dari kebenaran. Barangsiapa yang yang taat, maka mereka itu benar-benar telah memilih jalan yang lurus.
Indonesian.verse 72:15: Adapun orang-orang yang menyimpang dari kebenaran, maka mereka menjadi kayu api bagi neraka Jahannam.
Indonesian.verse 72:16: Dan bahwasanya: jikalau mereka tetap berjalan lurus di atas jalan itu (agama Islam), benar-benar Kami akan memberi minum kepada mereka air yang segar (rezeki yang banyak).
Indonesian.verse 72:17: Untuk Kami beri cobaan kepada mereka padanya. Dan barangsiapa yang berpaling dari peringatan Tuhannya, niscaya akan dimasukkan-Nya ke dalam azab yang amat berat.
Indonesian.verse 72:18: Dan sesungguhnya mesjid-mesjid itu adalah kepunyaan Allah. Maka janganlah kamu menyembah seseorangpun di dalamnya di samping (menyembah) Allah.
Indonesian.verse 72:19: Dan bahwasanya tatkala hamba Allah (Muhammad) berdiri menyembah-Nya (mengerjakan ibadat), hampir saja jin-jin itu desak mendesak mengerumuninya.
Indonesian.verse 72:20: Katakanlah: "Sesungguhnya aku hanya menyembah Tuhanku dan aku tidak mempersekutukan sesuatupun dengan-Nya".
Indonesian.verse 72:21: Katakanlah: "Sesungguhnya aku tidak kuasa mendatangkan sesuatu kemudharatanpun kepadamu dan tidak (pula) suatu kemanfaatan".
Indonesian.verse 72:22: Katakanlah: "Sesungguhnya aku sekali-kali tiada seorangpun dapat melindungiku dari (azab) Allah dan sekali-kali aku tiada akan memperoleh tempat berlindung selain daripada-Nya".
Indonesian.verse 72:23: Akan tetapi (aku hanya) menyampaikan (peringatan) dari Allah dan risalah-Nya. Dan barangsiapa yang mendurhakai Allah dan Rasul-Nya maka sesungguhnya baginyalah neraka Jahannam, mereka kekal di dalamnya selama-lamanya.
Indonesian.verse 72:24: Sehingga apabila mereka melihat azab yang diancamkan kepada mereka, maka mereka akan mengetahui siapakah yang lebih lemah penolongnya dan lebih sedikit bilangannya.
Indonesian.verse 72:25: Katakanlah: "Aku tidak mengetahui, apakah azab yang diancamkan kepadamu itu dekat ataukah Tuhanku menjadikan bagi (kedatangan) azab itu masa yang panjang?".
Indonesian.verse 72:26: (Dia adalah Tuhan) Yang Mengetahui yang ghaib, maka Dia tidak memperlihatkan kepada seorangpun tentang yang ghaib itu.
Indonesian.verse 72:27: Kecuali kepada rasul yang diridhai-Nya, maka sesungguhnya Dia mengadakan penjaga-penjaga (malaikat) di muka dan di belakangnya.
Indonesian.verse 72:28: Supaya Dia mengetahui, bahwa sesungguhnya rasul-rasul itu telah menyampaikan risalah-risalah Tuhannya, sedang (sebenarnya) ilmu-Nya meliputi apa yang ada pada mereka, dan Dia menghitung segala sesuatu satu persatu.

Italian.verse 72:1: Di': “Mi è stato rivelato che un gruppo di dèmoni ascoltarono e dissero: Invero abbiamo ascoltato una Lettura meravigliosa,
Italian.verse 72:2: che conduce sulla retta via; abbiamo creduto in essa e non assoceremo nessuno al nostro Signore.
Italian.verse 72:3: In verità Egli _ esaltata sia la Sua Maestà - non si è preso né compagna, né figlio.
Italian.verse 72:4: Uno stolto dei nostri diceva menzogne contro Allah.
Italian.verse 72:5: Pensavamo che né gli uomini, né i dèmoni, potessero proferire menzogne contro Allah.
Italian.verse 72:6: Invero c'erano degli uomini che si rifugiavano presso i dèmoni, e questo non fece che aumentare la loro follia:
Italian.verse 72:7: anch'essi pensavano, come lo pensavate voi, che Allah non avrebbe resuscitato nessuno.
Italian.verse 72:8: Invero abbiamo sfiorato il cielo, ma lo abbiamo trovato munito di temibili guardiani e di bolidi fiammeggianti.
Italian.verse 72:9: Ci sedevamo [un tempo] in sedi appropriate, per ascoltare. Ma ora chi vuole origliare trova un bolide fiammeggiante in agguato.
Italian.verse 72:10: Noi non sappiamo se sia stata decretata una sventura per coloro che stanno sulla terra, o se il loro Signore li voglia guidare [al bene].
Italian.verse 72:11: Tra noi ci sono dei giusti e altri che non lo sono: siamo in diverse sette.
Italian.verse 72:12: Pensavamo che mai avremmo potuto annullare [la potenza di] Allah sulla terra e che non avremmo mai potuto sfuggire [a Lui].
Italian.verse 72:13: Quando udimmo la Guida, credemmo; e chi crede nel suo Signore non teme danno, né offesa.
Italian.verse 72:14: [Ora] tra noi ci sono i musulmani e i ribelli. I musulmani sono quelli che hanno scelto la Retta via. [“musulmani”: cioè sottomessi alla volontà di Allah (gloria a Lui l'Altissimo)]
